Info.Title: Solomon Kane
Info.Writer: M.J. Bassett, Robert E. Howard (based on the character created by)
Info.Actors: James Purefoy, Mark O'Neal, Robert Orr, Richard Ryan
Info.Plot: A ruthless mercenary renounces violence after learning his soul is bound for hell. When a young girl is kidnapped and her family slain by a sorcerer's murderous cult, he is forced to fight and seek his redemption slaying evil.
